body_html:
Hi, I tried to compile this branch on MacOS and I had to fix some headers, maybe you'll find it useful:

--- a/torch/csrc/autograd/functions/basic_ops.h
+++ b/torch/csrc/autograd/functions/basic_ops.h
@@ -1,6 +1,9 @@
 #pragma once

 #include <memory>
+#include <string>
+#include <sstream>
+#include <iostream>
 #include <THPP/THPP.h>

 #include "torch/csrc/autograd/function.h"
diff --git a/torch/csrc/autograd/functions/utils.h b/torch/csrc/autograd/functions/utils.h
index 94fc1008..74e8eb65 100644
--- a/torch/csrc/autograd/functions/utils.h
+++ b/torch/csrc/autograd/functions/utils.h
@@ -2,6 +2,7 @@

 #include <functional>
 #include <memory>
+#include <array>

 #include "torch/csrc/autograd/function.h"
 #include "torch/csrc/autograd/variable.h"
